cydesc example
--------------
a simple console based application to demonstrate access to the Cypress
Generic USB Driver via the CyApi class library.  this example displays 
the device descriptors for all devices bound to the Cypress driver.
  

cydesc example support Visual studio 2008 and 2010. 

If you have Visual studio 2008 installed on your system , please use solution : \cydesc\Vs2008_sln\cydescVS2008.sln to open the project. This solution will load the cydesc.vcproj project file. 

If you have Visual studio 2010 installed on your system , please use solution : \cydesc\Vs2010_sln\cydescVS2010.sln to open the project. This solution will load the cydesc.vcxproj project file.
